export.title: Export
export.description: Define the input images and how they should be exported.

input.title: Input
input.description: A pattern matching the input files.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Set metadata on the exported images, like Exif or IPTC data.

exif.title: Exif
exif.description: How Exif tags should be applied to images.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: All the Exif tags to assign to exported images.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: The name of the tag to set.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the tag to set.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: The filter to use when resizing images.

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: All the sizes to export the images at.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Configuration to modulate the colors of the images.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: A grayscale mask that marks when areas to modulate.

modulate.title: Modulate
modulate.description: All the colors to export the images as.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the color to export.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix to prepend to the file name when exporting.

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: What to adjust the brightness by.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: What to adjust the saturation by.

hue.title: Hue
hue.description: What to adjust the hue by.
